entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023
